name: RUN & DON'T LOOK BACK!
description:
Project for "Game Design and Development 3: 3D Shooter" by Michigan State University.

So, I add:

  • 3 diferent lvls (instuction, boosfight, run&jump)
  • Redisigne all UI texture
  • Change UI structure
  • Add 2 new pick-ups: speed and jump boosts
  • Change lights and sound volume

by Shults Sophia with assets from MSU
